actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend the period during which expenditures to rehabilitate low-income rental housing may qualify for 5-year amortization.

summary.text: Extends for 2 years (until January 1, 1979) the period during which deductible expenditures to rehabilitate low-income rental housing may qualify for five-year amortization under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend the period during which expenditures to rehabilitate low-income rental housing may qualify for 5-year amortization.
